程序包 com.google.typography.font.sfntly.table.truetype

类 LocaTable.Builder

封闭类:
LocaTable
public static class LocaTable.Builder extends Table.Builder<LocaTable>
Builder for a loca table.

  • 方法详细资料

    • createBuilder

      public static LocaTable.Builder createBuilder(Header header, WritableFontData data)
      Create a new builder using the header information and data provided.
      参数:
      header - the header information
      data - the data holding the table
      返回:
      a new builder

    • formatVersion

      public FontHeaderTable.IndexToLocFormat formatVersion()
      Get the format version that will be used when the loca table is generated.
      返回:
      the loca table format version

    • setFormatVersion

      public void setFormatVersion(FontHeaderTable.IndexToLocFormat formatVersion)
      Set the format version to be used when generating the loca table.
      参数:
      formatVersion -

    • locaList

      public List<Integer> locaList()
      Gets the List of locas for loca table builder. These may be manipulated in any way by the caller and the changes will be reflected in the final loca table produced as long as no subsequent call is made to the setLocaList(List) method. If there is no current data for the loca table builder or the loca list have not been previously set then this will return an empty List.
      返回:
      the list of glyph builders
      另请参阅:
      • setLocaList(List)

    • setLocaList

      public void setLocaList(List<Integer> list)
      Set the list of locas to be used for building this table. If any existing list was already retrieved with the locaList() method then the connection of that previous list to this builder will be broken.
      参数:
      list -
      另请参阅:
      • locaList()

    • glyphOffset

      public int glyphOffset(int glyphId)
      Return the offset for the given glyph id. Valid glyph ids are from 0 to one more than the number of glyphs. The zero entry is the special entry for the notdef glyph. The final entry beyond the last glyph id is used to calculate the size of the last glyph.
      参数:
      glyphId - the glyph id to get the offset for; must be less than or equal to one more than the number of glyph ids
      返回:
      the offset in the glyph table to the specified glyph id

    • glyphLength

      public int glyphLength(int glyphId)
      Get the length of the data in the glyph table for the specified glyph id. This is a convenience method that uses the specified glyph id
      参数:
      glyphId - the glyph id to get the offset for; must be less than or equal to the number of glyphs
      返回:
      the length of the data in the glyph table for the specified glyph id

    • setNumGlyphs

      public void setNumGlyphs(int numGlyphs)
      Set the number of glyphs. This method sets the number of glyphs that the builder will attempt to parse location data for from the raw binary data. This method only needs to be called (and must be) when the raw data for this builder has been changed. It does not by itself reset the data or clear any set loca list.
      参数:
      numGlyphs - the number of glyphs represented by the data

    • numGlyphs

      public int numGlyphs()
      Get the number of glyphs that this builder has support for.
      返回:
      the number of glyphs.

    • revert

      public void revert()
      Revert the loca table builder to the state contained in the last raw data set on the builder. That raw data may be that read from a font file when the font builder was created, that set by a user of the loca table builder, or null data if this builder was created as a new empty builder.

    • numLocas

      public int numLocas()
      Get the number of locations or locas. This will be one more than the number of glyphs for this table since the last loca position is used to indicate the size of the final glyph.
      返回:
      the number of locas

    • loca

      public int loca(int index)
      Get the value from the loca table for the index specified. These are the raw values from the table that are used to compute the offset and size of a glyph in the glyph table. Valid index values run from 0 to the number of glyphs in the font.
      参数:
      index - the loca table index
      返回:
      the loca table value
